shoutouts.quote: Risk Guardian blocked my revenge trade after a bad morning. I cooled off, came back, and passed my prop challenge the next week. That one feature paid for a year of access.
The BTC.D Quadrant called ALT_SEASON before anyone on Twitter. I rotated into SOL and LINK and caught a 12% move while everyone else was stuck in BTC.
Signal Intelligence showed me GBPJPY had a 78% win rate during London Kill Zone. I stopped trading it during NY and my results flipped overnight. Data over gut feeling.
Even on the free tier, the daily education and Amun AI taught me more about ICT concepts in 2 weeks than 6 months of YouTube. Just upgraded to Premium.
3 prop challenges passed in 2 months. The Mentor AI analyzed my patterns and told me I was overtrading during Asia. Cut those trades, everything changed.
I used to watch 6 charts at once and still miss entries. Now Scanner finds the setups, I get a Discord ping, and I just confirm and execute. My screen time dropped 80%.
